ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and make your Lord your goal!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And turn to your Lord with all your love.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and turn to your Lord with longing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and be devoted to your Lord's service.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And to your Lord turn intentions and hopes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And make your Lord your exclusive object.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and let thy Lord be thy Quest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And strive to please thy Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and to your Lord turn [all] your attention.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And to thy Lord turn (all) thy attention.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And to your Lord (Alone) turn (all your intentions and hopes and) your invocations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and let your longing be for your Lord (in humility).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And to your Lord turn for everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And to your Lord direct [your] longing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [94:8] and seek, devote yourself humbly to, your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And strive to please thy Lord) and ask your needs from your Lord'. And of the surah in which the Fig is mentioned, which is all Meccan and consists of 8 verses, 34 words and 150 letters: Surah 95: The Fig (al-Tin) And of the surah in which the Fig is mentioned, which is all Meccan and consists of 8 verses, 34 words and 150 letters:
